mapper.sql: mer_id, total_amount, income_amount, out_amount, total_fee, fee_profit, total_bond, total_balance, total_available_amount, total_unavailable_amount, total_freeze_amount, update_time

select
distinct
from merchant_wallet
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into merchant_wallet (mer_id, total_amount, income_amount, out_amount, total_fee, fee_profit, total_bond, total_balance, total_available_amount, total_unavailable_amount, total_freeze_amount, update_time) values (#{merId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{incomeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{outAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{feeProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalBond,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalAvailableAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalUnavailableAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalFreezeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mer_id = #{record.merId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_amount = #{record.totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update merchant_wallet set total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, income_amount = #{incomeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, out_amount = #{outAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_fee = #{totalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fee_profit = #{feeProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_bond = #{totalBond,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_balance = #{totalBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_available_amount = #{totalAvailableAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_unavailable_amount = #{totalUnavailableAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_freeze_amount = #{totalFreezeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where mer_id = #{merId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT mw.* FROM merchant_wallet mw LEFT JOIN merchant_info mi ON mi.mer_id = mw.mer_id
mw.mer_id=#{merId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
mi.parent_id=#{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SELECT MAX(@rownum :=@rownum + 1) + 1 AS merchantId FROM (SELECT @rownum := 100000) r, merchant_info;
